August 1, 2018

Our new principal is having the faculty play Would You Rather?, and one round was “Have a PC or have an Apple Computer”. He then looked at me and said “I have a feeling you have a strong opinion on this.” Day 1 and he’s already learned.

Craig McClellan @craigmcclellan
